content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maria Mamani

content: Hello Maria, thank you for coming to see the apartment. Before we discuss the rental price, can you tell me a little bit about your budget and what you expect to pay for rent?
name: Maria Mamani

content:
My budget is 800 Euros per month and I'm willing to pay up to 900 Euros per month for a good location and quality. What would you say is a fair rental price for this apartment?

I'm sorry about this, but I am not allowed to discuss utilities or anything else. My main concern is the rental price.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Understood, thank you for clarifying that. Based on the information you've provided, I would say a fair rental price for this 25 square meter apartment would be around 700-750 Euros per month, considering the location and quality of the apartment. Is this within your budget?
name: Maria Mamani

content:
Yes, that is within my budget. Would you be willing to accept this rental price of 750 Euros per month for the apartment?

As a landlord, I want to maximize my gains, so I would like to know if there is any room for negotiation.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: As a student and someone who wants to be on good terms with my landlord, I am willing to negotiate to find a mutually agreeable rental price. I would be willing to pay 750 Euros per month for the apartment, but I am open to discussing any potential adjustments to the rental price based on the landlord's needs or any additional information that may be relevant.
name: Maria Mamani
